actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that percentage depletion shall not be allowable for lease bonuses, advance royalties, or similar payments with respect to oil and gas properties.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that percentage depletion shall not be allowable for lease bonuses, advance royalties, or similar payments with respect to oil and gas properties.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that percentage depletion shall not be allowable for lease bonuses, advance royalties, or similar payments with respect to oil and gas properties.
